name: user_pseudo_id
description: The user pseudo identifier

name: user_id
description: The user id for loged in users

name: feature_date
description: Date that serves as the basis for the calculation of the features

name: device_category
description: The device category last used by the user

name: device_mobile_brand_name
description: The device brand name last used by the user

name: device_mobile_model_name
description: The device model name last used by the user

name: device_os
description: The device operating system last used by the user

name: device_language
description: The device language last used by the user

name: device_web_browser
description: The device web browser last used by the user

name: geo_sub_continent
description: The geographic subcontinent which the user last accessed from

name: geo_country
description: The geographic country which the user last accessed from

name: geo_region
description: THe geographic region which the user last accessed from

name: geo_city
description: The geographic city which the user last accessed from

name: geo_metro
description: The geographic metropolitan area which the user last accessed from

name: last_traffic_source_medium
description: The last traffic source medium the user has been acquired

name: last_traffic_source_name
description: The last traffic source name the user has been acquired

name: last_traffic_source_source
description: The last traffic source source the user has been acquired

name: first_traffic_source_medium
description: The first traffic source medium the user has been acquired

name: first_traffic_source_name
description: The first traffic source name the user has been acquired

name: first_traffic_source_source
description: The first traffic source source the user has been acquired

name: has_signed_in_with_user_id
description: A boolean value indicating whether the user has signed in with an user id

name: active_users_past_1_7_day
description: The number of times the user has been active in the past 7 days

name: active_users_past_8_14_day
description: The number of times the user has been active in the past 8 to 14 days

name: purchases_past_1_7_day
description: The number of times the user has purchased in the past 7 days

name: purchases_past_8_14_day
description: The number of times the user has purchased in the past 8 to 14 days

name: visits_past_1_7_day
description: The number of times the user has visited the website in the past 7 days

name: visits_past_8_14_day
description: The number of times the user has visited the website in the past 8 to 14 days

name: view_items_past_1_7_day
description: The number of times the user has viewed items in the past 7 days

name: view_items_past_8_14_day
description: The number of times the user has viewed items in the past 8 to 14 days

name: add_to_carts_past_1_7_day
description: The number of times the user has added products to carts in the past 7 days

name: add_to_carts_past_8_14_day
description: The number of times the user has added products to carts in the past 8 to 14 days

name: checkouts_past_1_7_day
description: The number of times the user has checked out in the past 7 days

name: checkouts_past_8_14_day
description: The number of times the user has checked out in the past 8 to 14 days

name: ltv_revenue_past_1_7_day
description: The customer lifetime value gained in the past 7 days

name: ltv_revenue_past_7_15_day
description: The customer lifetime value gained in the past 7 to 15 days
